Hi, I run this on mac and it works for me. I'm lack of experience with Windows. I take that as the workdir is changed to the root in the previous step. I think you are right the line

Inside singleton/g11n-ws, run a build using Gradle.

make a confusion. Shall it be better with

Run a build using Gradle.

The reason I change this is so this line

java -jar publish/singleton-0.1.0.jar

can be executed without going back upwards to the root again.
